sentence.Network_en: Only the perchlorate shows marked sensitiveness and possibly initiating properties.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有高氯酸盐表现有显著的感度和可能具有起爆性能.

sentence.Network_en: Hydrazine perchlorate and lithium perchlorate form two eutectics.
sentence.Network_cn: 过氯酸肼和过氯酸锂形成两种低共熔物.

sentence.Network_en: Alumium powder is placed in a saturated solution of ammonium perchlorate in water.
sentence.Network_cn: 铝粉放在过氯酸铵的饱和溶液中.
